About This Game

This game is recognized by this classic of the genre, is still considered the most refined and authentic "simulation of an assassin." The plot tells of the beginning of a career killer dark killer nicknamed Hitman, which became one of the most recognizable game characters around the world. Having joined the Agency, he received an order to destroy the head of the Chinese triads. Performing a task, Forty-Seventh learns that his victim was associated with the project, thanks to which he was created and Hitman. It is time to find out the truth and destroy those who dared to interfere in his fate!

About This Game

Cult hero returns to its most successful missions with a variety of tactical decisions deadly arsenal and special spy devices. Know gloomy philosophy Hitman, one of the most ruthless and cynical hired killers of modern times. Pick up a weapon, use it for its intended purpose and forget about morality. In this work, there is no place personal experiences - there is only business. Join the famous Agent 47 - offers the largest contracts, more intense missions, more weapons, more realism. And remember, money does not smell!

About This Game

Players will once again act as an unforgettable Agent 47, who returned to his bloody work. His colleagues in the deadly business are killed one by one, Hitman soon realizes that he was under the gun.

Hitman. Blood Money "took all the best from previous games on the imperturbable murderer: the game not only has tremendous dynamism, but also requires a player to strategic thinking. In addition to the traditional variety of ways to "eliminate", the player will be able to lure guards into traps, arranging "accidents" to buy and modify to earn "blood money" weapons, as well as to bribe police, unwanted witnesses and informants.
